p:
In addition to temporal variations of the FOI, we also explore the role of age, housing, income, sex and living in a particular region as predictors of the risk of infection by MAYV and CHIKV. We included these predictors in the model by introducing multiplicative factors to the FOI. The vector of sociodemographic characteristics of individual j is
